strings.settings.keyBindingDescription: Configure key bindings for in-game controls here
strings.settings.enableGlobalKeyMappingDescripti: Apply key binding settings to external scripts
strings.settings.mapTrackingFeatureMatchingMetho: Affects all map tracking functions, restart required
strings.settings.worldMapTeleportSettingsDescrip: Configuration for teleport functions in map tracking, auto domain, one dragon, etc.
strings.settings.enableMapZoomDuringMovementDesc: Recommended to enable, disabling may cause errors when running certain scripts
strings.settings.maxMouseMovementDistanceDescrip: [100-2000] Too large may cause mouse to move out of window
strings.settings.mapZoomOutDistanceDescription: [>600] Map will zoom out when distance is greater than this to speed up teleportation
strings.settings.mapZoomInDistanceDescription: [200-600] Map will zoom in when distance is less than this to improve movement precision
strings.settings.mouseMovementIntervalDescriptio: [2-100] Lower values move mouse faster, increase if map movement causes stuttering
strings.settings.statueOfTheSevenDescription: Used to specify statue for healing
strings.settings.useNearestStatueDescription: When enabled, automatically selects the nearest statue, ignoring specified location below
strings.settings.moveAfterTeleportToStatueDescri: When enabled, automatically moves toward the statue after teleporting
strings.settings.statueCountryDescription: Select the country where the statue is located
strings.settings.statueRegionDescription: Select the region where the statue is located
strings.settings.showMaskBorderDescription: Purple border line around the game window
strings.settings.useMaskSubformDescription: Mask can completely follow window movement, but has some bugs, restart required
strings.settings.healingWaitIntervalDescription: [1.0-30.0] How long to wait after teleporting to a statue before healing
strings.settings.importLocalScriptRepoDescriptio: Use when script repository cannot be updated online
strings.settings.otherSettingsDescription: Configure other features like auto-focus recovery
strings.settings.autoActivateGameWindow: Force Activate Game Window When Focus Lost
strings.settings.autoActivateGameWindowDescripti: Applies to scheduler tasks and some independent tasks. After losing focus, will automatically activate the game window. If you want to switch out of the game window, pause the task first
strings.settings.autoCollectExpeditions: Auto Collect Expeditions During Map Teleport
strings.settings.autoCollectExpeditionsDescripti: In scheduler path tracking tasks, when opening the world map to teleport, it will first check if there are expeditions to collect. If so, it will automatically collect them (using the One Dragon reward collection logic). Takes effect after selecting the collection city.
strings.settings.schedulerErrorRestartConfigDesc: When scheduler tasks throw unexpected errors, after accumulating a certain number of errors, BGI will automatically restart to restore functionality.
strings.settings.errorCountDescription: When running scheduler tasks, this counts failures due to errors. When the count is reached, BGI will restart.
strings.settings.farmingPlanConfigDescription: When enabled, daily farming statistics (starting at 4 AM) will be tracked. If the limit is exceeded (requires script support with farming statistics flag enabled, or tracking file directory control files to record data), subsequent farming tasks will be skipped.
strings.settings.dailyEliteLimitDescription: When the number of elite enemies farmed reaches this limit, scripts targeting elite enemies will be skipped.
strings.settings.dailyMobLimitDescription: When the number of common enemies farmed reaches this limit, scripts targeting common enemies will be skipped.
strings.settings.useMihoyoDataDescription: Uses HoYoLAB data (with approximately 2-3 hour delay) to adjust farming counts. Since HoYoLAB cookies expire after some time and need to be refreshed, if HoYoLAB data exists for the day, the limits below will be used; otherwise, the limits above will be used (estimated values may differ due to non-farming kills, such as ley line farming).
strings.settings.mihoyoDailyEliteLimitDescriptio: When the number of elite enemies farmed reaches this limit (based on HoYoLAB data), scripts targeting elite enemies will be skipped.
strings.settings.mihoyoDailyMobLimitDescription: When the number of common enemies farmed reaches this limit (based on HoYoLAB data), scripts targeting common enemies will be skipped.
strings.settings.mihoyoSettingsDescription: Configure HoYoLAB related information such as cookie
strings.settings.syncCookieWithSchedulerDescript: When enabled, cookie will be synchronized between scheduler log and this setting
strings.settings.versionUpdateDescription: Check if new software version is available
strings.settings.betaVersionWarning: [BETA] Very unstable, please update with caution!
strings.settings.getLatestBetaFromGithub: Get Latest Beta Version Directly from Github
strings.settings.aboutBetterGIDescription: View project, documentation and other information
strings.settings.restartGameTooDescription: When restarting BGI, also restart the game. This configuration will only take effect if the startup configuration is enabled: Launch Genshin Simultaneously and Auto Enter Game.
strings.settings.combatFailureIsErrorDescription: In farming scripts, the actual number of successful battles must be greater than or equal to the expected number of battles to be considered successful, otherwise an exception is thrown. This can solve issues like failing to open the map during farming, team switching, getting stuck in the Z interface, or monthly card popups that may cause infinite freezing. However, you need to ensure your team's strength, as there's a possibility that consecutive script failures due to excessive resurrections could trigger infinite restarts.
strings.settings.incompletePathIsErrorDescriptio: A stricter condition than combat failure. When checked, if a tracking file is not fully executed, it counts as a failure. This option requires high stability of your tracking tasks. You can first observe the logs with error statistics to see if there are consecutive red flags exceeding the failure count; if so, it's not recommended to check this option.
strings.settings.title: Settings
strings.settings.exitToTray: Minimize to system tray on exit
strings.settings.exitToTrayDescription: When enabled, clicking the exit button will minimize to system tray and continue running. Right-click tray icon to exit
strings.settings.screenshotDescription: You can save screenshots using hotkeys. Files are saved in log/screenshot
strings.settings.screenshotHotkeyDescription: Screenshot function is mainly used for error troubleshooting, training material quick acquisition and other development-related functions
strings.settings.screenshotUidCoverDescription: Generated screenshots will cover the UID area in the bottom right corner
strings.settings.httpServerDescription: Can be called by external programs, configuration changes require restart to take effect
strings.settings.httpServerPortDescription: HTTP server listening port number, range 1-65535
strings.settings.showLogWindowDescription: Display log window in mask, click to open log folder
strings.settings.showTaskStatusDescription: Display real-time task status in mask
strings.settings.showGameFpsDescription: Restart required to take effect, may cause game crashes
strings.settings.showImageRecognitionDescription: Real-time display of various image recognition results
strings.settings.enableUidCoverDescription: Cover the UID area in the bottom right corner
strings.settings.showMinimapDirectionsDescriptio: Display directional text around the minimap
strings.macro.title: Auxiliary Control Settings
strings.macro.oneKeyMacroDescription: Recognizes current character and executes corresponding macro
strings.macro.hotkeyTriggerModeDescription: Hold to repeat: Repeat while held; Toggle: Press to start, press again to stop
strings.notification.title: Notification Settings
strings.notification.allowJsNotificationsDescrip: Allow JS scripts to send notifications when enabled
strings.notification.windowsDescription: Windows notifications should not overlap with game interface, otherwise easy to misclick notifications
strings.notification.feishuAppIdDescription: If AppId and AppSecret are filled, images will be sent
strings.notification.feishuAppSecretDescription: If AppId and AppSecret are filled, images will be sent
strings.notification.qqNumberDescription: Enter QQ number to receive messages
strings.notification.groupNumberDescription: Enter group number to receive messages
strings.notification.emailPasswordDescription: Enter email password or authorization code
strings.notification.barkDeviceKeysDescription: Multiple devices separated by comma, semicolon or space
strings.notification.barkGroupDescription: Display by group in notification center
strings.macro.macroConfigDescription: Configure macro for each character, e.g.: Hu Tao charged attack jump, click to view instructions
strings.macro.defaultMacroPriorityDescription: When character's macroPriority is set to 0, use this default macro number (1~5)
strings.macro.characterMacroSettingsDescription: The above macro configuration supports setting macro numbers individually for each character. Set the macroPriority field (1-5) in character macro configuration, set to 0 to use the default combat macro number above.
strings.macro.neuvilletteDescription: Quickly move mouse horizontally, requires hotkey configuration to trigger
strings.macro.mouseDistanceDescription: Can be negative, larger absolute value moves faster, don't configure too large
strings.macro.mouseIntervalDescription: Try to set a number greater than 0, switch tabs after configuration to take effect (same for other configurations)
strings.macro.fastEnhanceDescription: Quickly skip enhancement result display, requires hotkey configuration to trigger
strings.macro.enhanceDelayDescription: When unable to skip enhancement result display under high latency, need to extend this time configuration
strings.macro.oneKeyBuyDescription: Use on item purchase/exchange page, starting from selected item, hold to continuously purchase
strings.macro.teapotDescription: Automatically open backpack, place Serenitea Pot and enter
strings.macro.confirmCancelDescription: Bind hotkey to Genshin's confirm/cancel buttons
strings.macro.spaceHoldDescription: Easily break free from freeze, not recommended due to underwater long-press space scenarios
strings.macro.fHoldDescription: Quickly pick up large amounts of drops, somewhat redundant with auto-pickup feature
strings.task.title: Independent Task Settings
strings.task.autoGeniusInvocationDescription: Fully automatic card game - click to view tutorial
strings.task.selectDeckDescription: Choose the deck and strategy you want to use
strings.task.setDelayDescription: Add delay if operations are too fast and animations haven't finished playing
strings.task.autoWoodDescription: Equip 'King Tree's Blessing', refresh and collect wood by cycling game restarts - click to view tutorial
strings.task.loopCountDescription: How many times to loop wood cutting, enter 0 for infinite loop until manual termination
strings.task.enableOcrWoodLimit: Enable OCR Wood Quantity Limit (Requires 1080P+ resolution)
strings.task.enableOcrWoodLimitDescription: OCR recognizes and accumulates wood count after cutting, automatically stops when limit reached
strings.task.woodCountLimit: Wood Quantity Limit (Genshin daily max 2000 per wood type)
strings.task.woodCountLimitDescription: Takes effect when wood quantity limit is enabled, automatically stops cutting when configured limit is reached
strings.task.gadgetDelayDescription: Adjust this value if you want to see the wood acquisition prompt after using gadget
strings.task.autoFightDescription: Automatically execute selected combat strategy - click to view tutorial
strings.task.optimizeByCd: Optimize Character Rotation by Skill CD
strings.task.optimizeByCdDescription: Based on entered characters or character+CD, decide to skip character's turn when elemental skill CD hasn't ended, optimizing combat flow. Can enter character names or character name+number (comma separated), multiple types separated by semicolon, e.g.: Baizhu;Zhongli,12; If character name only, uses built-in CD check (or number less than 0), if character name+number, treats number as skill CD (seconds).
strings.task.autoDetectFightEndDescription: Stop auto combat function when combat is detected to have ended
strings.task.fasterFightEndCheckDescription: Quickly check combat end, in one script round, can check every certain seconds (default 5) or after specified character operations (when each character completes their round of script).
strings.dialog.confirmClearTasks: Are you sure you want to clear all tasks?
strings.dialog.confirmMigrateConfig: Old BetterGI configuration detected. Do you want to migrate configuration and clean up old directory?
strings.dialog.migrateConfigSuccess: Configuration migration successful. The software will exit automatically. Please restart BetterGI manually!
strings.dialog.confirmResetRepo: Are you sure you want to reset the script repository? Use this function when unable to update normally. Please update the script repository again after reset.
strings.dialog.securityError: Detected that current BetterGI is located on C drive. Failed to modify directory permissions, which may cause WebView2 related functions to be unusable!
strings.dialog.subscribeScriptFailed: Failed to subscribe to script link!
strings.dialog.noCustomConfig: This script does not provide custom configuration
strings.dialog.onlyJsHasConfig: Only JS scripts have custom configuration
strings.toast.selectRepoChannel: Please select a script repository update channel.
strings.toast.updatingRepo: Updating script repository, please wait patiently...
strings.toast.repoUpdateSuccess: Script repository updated successfully, new content available
strings.toast.repoAlreadyLatest: Script repository is already up to date
strings.toast.waitForUpdateComplete: Please wait for current update to complete before resetting.
strings.toast.repoResetSuccess: Script repository has been reset, please update the script repository again.
strings.toast.repoNotExist: Script repository does not exist, no need to reset
strings.toast.startScreenshotFirst: Please start the screenshot tool on the startup page first before using this function
strings.toast.useSchedulerForMultiple: When executing multiple map tracking tasks, please use the scheduler function
strings.toast.noCookieWarning: Cookie not filled, hoeing statistics will not be enabled this time!
strings.toast.gettingTravelData: Getting travel diary data from miHoYo, please wait patiently!
strings.toast.mihoyoDataSuccess: miHoYo data retrieved successfully, starting analysis, please wait patiently!
strings.toast.mihoyoApiError: miHoYo API access error, hoeing statistics will not update latest data this time!
strings.toast.mihoyoApiErrorNoStats: miHoYo API access error, hoeing statistics will not be enabled this time!
strings.toast.selectCombatStrategy: Please select a combat strategy in the dropdown configuration first!
strings.toast.combatStrategyNotExist: The currently selected auto combat strategy file does not exist
strings.toast.taskAlreadyExists: Task or configuration group already exists
strings.toast.noSecretTreasureConfig: No Secret Treasure purchase configuration set, please configure first
strings.toast.selectTreasureWarning: Selection is empty, please select treasures to purchase
strings.toast.selectConfigAndTask: Please select configuration group and tasks first
strings.toast.executeConfigFailed: Failed to execute configuration group task
strings.toast.configAlreadyExists: One Dragon configuration {0} already exists, please do not add duplicates
strings.hotkey.title: Hotkey Settings
strings.hotkey.description: Global Hotkeys: Only support combination keys and function keys, take effect immediately when software starts. Key/Mouse Monitoring: Support any single keyboard key and mouse side buttons, take effect only after function is started (recommended). Click the type button to switch hotkey types. Functions that require long press cannot use global hotkeys.
strings.app.title: Better Genshin Impact
strings.home.subtitle: Better Genshin Impact, Free and Open Source
strings.home.viewDocs: Click to view documentation and tutorials
strings.home.captureDescription: Various functions can only be used after the screenshot tool is started, click to expand startup related configurations.
strings.home.captureDescriptionPart1: Various functions can only be used after the screenshot tool is started,
strings.home.captureDescriptionPart2: click to expand startup related configurations
strings.home.triggerIntervalDescription: Default 50ms, ordinary users are not recommended to adjust this value, see documentation for specific adjustment methods
strings.home.testCaptureDescription: Test function, test the effects of several screenshot modes
strings.home.manualSelectWindow: Manual Window Selection (use when Genshin window cannot be found)
strings.home.manualSelectWindowDescription: Use when Genshin is already running but clicking "Start" still prompts that the window cannot be found
strings.home.autoCloseWin11Optimization: Automatically close Windows11 windowed optimization to support BitBlt
strings.home.autoCloseWin11OptimizationDescripti: Restart the game after changing settings
strings.home.launchGenshinDescription: When starting the screenshot tool, if Genshin is not running, automatically start Genshin.
strings.home.genshinInstallPath: Genshin Installation Path (does not support cloud Genshin linkage startup)
strings.home.launchParametersDescription: If you don't know what launch parameters are, please don't fill them in.
strings.home.autoEnterGameDescription: Automatically enter the game after Genshin starts (auto open door, claim monthly card)
strings.home.useStarwardRecord: Use Starward to Record Game Time
strings.home.useStarwardRecordDescription: Starward will synchronously record time after starting the game
strings.welcome.openSourceFree: 🔹 This software is open source and free, you can click 🌟Star ->
strings.welcome.neverAuthorized: ❗This software has never authorized any third-party platform to
strings.welcome.ifPaidFor: . If you paid for this software (Xianyu, Taobao, etc.), please report the seller and request a
strings.picker.doubleClickToSelect: Double-click to select the window to capture
strings.trigger.title: Real-time Triggered Automation Task Settings
strings.trigger.autoPick.title: Auto Pick
strings.trigger.autoPick.description: Automatically press F to pick/interact when option is not NPC dialogue and not in blacklist
strings.trigger.autoPick.fastModeDescription: When enabled, will no longer recognize specific pickup content, blacklist and whitelist will be disabled
strings.trigger.autoPick.ocrEngine: Select Auto Pick Text Recognition Engine
strings.trigger.autoPick.ocrEngineDescription: Paddle can recognize all text, slow speed, low consumption; Yap can recognize partial text, fast and accurate, high consumption
strings.trigger.autoPick.blacklistDescription: Exclude NPC dialogues, various interaction options, items that don't need to be picked up, etc.
strings.trigger.autoPick.whitelistDescription: Content that needs to actively press F to interact, please use with blacklist
strings.trigger.autoPick.customKeyDescription: Default is F, comes with E key, please read documentation for other keys
strings.trigger.autoSkip.title: Auto Story
strings.trigger.autoSkip.description: Quickly skip story text, automatically select options, automatically submit items, etc.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.backgroundMode: Enable Background Mode (will only use interaction key for story)
strings.trigger.autoSkip.backgroundModeDescripti: Please don't minimize the game, mouse will automatically return to game when not in dialogue
strings.trigger.autoSkip.quickSkipDescription: If you want to listen to complete main story voice, you can disable this feature
strings.trigger.autoSkip.optionPriorityDescripti: Prioritize first option, select last option, or don't select option
strings.trigger.autoSkip.optionDelayDescription: Convenient to still see options clearly during auto story
strings.trigger.autoSkip.submitGoodsDescription: When item submission interface appears during dialogue, will automatically submit, supports multiple items
strings.trigger.autoSkip.closePopupDescription: Close popup pages that appear during dialogue, may accidentally close map, camera
strings.trigger.autoSkip.dailyRewardsDescription: When talking to Katheryne, will automatically 'claim daily commission rewards'
strings.trigger.autoSkip.reExploreDescription: Automatically claim completed exploration rewards and re-dispatch
strings.trigger.autoHangout.title: Auto Hangout
strings.trigger.autoHangout.description: This feature only works when auto story is enabled, automatically select hangout options
strings.trigger.autoHangout.skipButton: Auto Click When Skip Button Exists
strings.trigger.autoHangout.skipButtonDescriptio: When skip button exists in upper left corner during hangout, automatically click skip
strings.trigger.autoHangout.branch: Select Hangout Branch (doesn't support bubble association selection)
strings.trigger.autoHangout.branchDescription: Will select options based on selected branch keywords
strings.about.title: BetterGI - Better Genshin Impact
strings.about.author: Author:
strings.update.defaultServerDescription: Regular users can click here to update directly
strings.update.mirrorServerDescription: Mirror users can enter CDK for high-speed updates
strings.update.hutaoCloudDescription: Hutao Cloud CDN users can use Hutao Cloud CDN for high-speed updates
strings.jsScript.title: Custom Javascript Scripts (Experimental)
strings.jsScript.description: You can call BetterGI's various abilities in Genshin through Javascript. Please use in scheduler!
strings.jsScript.viewTutorial: Click to view Javascript script usage and writing tutorial
strings.jsScript.name: Name
strings.task.stopTaskDescription: Stop the execution of independent tasks below
strings.home.wgcBitmapCache: Enable Bitmap Cache for WindowsGraphicsCapture Screenshot Mode
strings.home.wgcBitmapCacheDescription: Try disabling this feature and restarting the software if cloud Genshin shows black screen or Genshin has frame drops
strings.hardware.title: Inference Device Configuration
strings.hardware.restartRequired: Restart required to take effect, incorrect modifications may cause program exceptions
strings.hardware.inferenceDeviceTypeDescription: Select the hardware device type for inference, default is CPU
strings.hardware.gpuDeviceIdDescription: Specify the GPU device number to use. Set to 0 for default configuration. You can check the number in Task Manager
strings.hardware.optimizedModel: Output Optimized Model Files to Cache
strings.hardware.optimizedModelDescription: Note: Using on unsupported executors will cause exceptions. Default is off.
strings.hardware.cudaDeviceIdDescription: Specify CUDA device number. Set to 0 for default configuration. You can check the number in nvidia-smi
strings.hardware.autoAppendCudaPathDescription: Automatically add system CUDA environment path. Default is enabled
strings.hardware.additionalPathDescription: Additional path, separated by ;. Default is empty. Can be used to add DLL paths
strings.hardware.enableTensorRtCacheDescription: Improve TensorRT model loading speed. Default is enabled
strings.hardware.embedTensorRtCacheDescription: Embed engine cache in model files. Default is enabled
strings.hardware.cacheManagementDescription: Old version cache files can be manually deleted.
strings.hardware.forceCpuOcrDescription: Solve some GPU inference performance issues. Default is enabled
strings.home.launchGenshinSimultaneouslyDescript: When starting the screenshot tool, if Genshin is not running, automatically start Genshin.
strings.home.genshinInstallLocation: Genshin Installation Location (does not support cloud Genshin linkage startup)
strings.home.launchParametersWarning: If you don't know what launch parameters are, please don't fill them in.
strings.home.autoClickMonthlyCardDescription: Automatically click monthly card after entering the game, if available
strings.home.manualSelectWindowDescriptionFixed: Use when Genshin is already running but clicking Start still prompts that the window cannot be found
strings.scriptRepo.title: Script Repository
strings.dialog.configGroupExistsMessage: Configuration group {0} already exists, please do not add duplicates
strings.keyBindings.title: Key Bindings Settings
strings.keyBindings.description: The key settings here are effective for built-in functions except auto-pickup, fishing, rhythm games, and wood cutting by default. Enable 'Global Key Mapping' in settings to make it effective for JS scripts, combat scripts, and simple strategy scripts in map tracking. Please manually set pickup key, Stellar Reunion key, and hide main interface key.
strings.dialog.copyConfigGroupFailed: Configuration group {0} already exists, copy failed
strings.dialog.renameConfigGroupFailed: Configuration group {0} already exists, rename failed
strings.dialog.selectJsScript: Please select the JS script to add
strings.dialog.selectKeyMouseScript: Please select the key-mouse script to add
strings.dialog.selectPathingTask: Please select the map tracking task to add
strings.dialog.shellWarning:
Executing shell operations poses extreme risks! Do not enter commands you don't understand! This may cause security vulnerabilities and damage the system!
When executing shell commands, the game may lose focus
strings.dialog.enterShellCommand: Please enter the shell command to execute
strings.dialog.blacklistPlaceholder:
Please enter blacklist configuration here, one record per line.
Example:
Exquisite Chest
Slime Condensate
Firm Arrowhead
strings.dialog.whitelistPlaceholder:
Please enter whitelist configuration here, one record per line.
Example:
Investigate
Synthesize
Activate
strings.dialog.blacklistConfig: Blacklist configuration, one record per line
strings.dialog.whitelistConfig: Whitelist configuration, one record per line
strings.mapPathing.title: Map Tracking (Experimental)
strings.mapPathing.description: Can achieve automatic collection, automatic mining, automatic farming and other functions. Please use in scheduler!
strings.mapPathing.viewTutorial: Click to view map tracking and recording tutorial
strings.mapPathing.name: Name
strings.oneDragon.craft.title: Craft Condensed Resin
strings.oneDragon.dailyCommission.title: Daily Commission
strings.scriptGroup.pathingConfigDescription: Force modify character positions in team during walking for shields/healing
strings.scriptGroup.autoPickDescription: Recommended to enable for picking up drops and collectibles along the route
strings.scriptGroup.partyNameDescription: Team name is the text you manually set in the game
strings.scriptGroup.visitStatueBeforeSwitch: Force Visit Statue Before Team Switch
strings.scriptGroup.visitStatueBeforeDescription: Going to a statue before switching teams can avoid switching failures due to abnormal status
strings.scriptGroup.guardianAvatarDescription: Position of shield/healing character, recommended: Qiqi, Layla
strings.scriptGroup.guardianElementalSkillInterv: May need to set slightly longer than actual skill cooldown
strings.scriptGroup.guardianElementalSkillLongPr: Zhongli long press for shield, Qiqi long press to transform, etc.
strings.scriptGroup.mainAvatarDescription: Recommended to be the same as guardian position, no special configuration needed
strings.scriptGroup.combatConfigDescription: Enable above map tracking configuration, enable this to set combat configuration
strings.scriptGroup.taskCycleConfigDescription: Decide whether to execute this configuration group by day
strings.scriptGroup.boundaryTimeDescription: Usually set to 0 or 4. If 0, day starts at midnight; if 4, day starts at 4 AM, before 4 AM counts as previous day
strings.scriptGroup.cycleDescription: Different materials have different cycles, configure as needed. Ores: 3, Ascension materials: 2, or set how many days between executions
strings.scriptGroup.indexDescription: Execution cycle index, based on days from timestamp (adjusted by boundary time), modulo cycle plus 1. Execute when matches config, otherwise skip. Can be understood as which day in cycle to execute
strings.scriptGroup.calculateExecutionIndexDescr: Click calculate to determine today's execution index (which day in the cycle today is)
strings.scheduler.experimentalSelectOrAddGroup: (Experimental) Please select or add a configuration group in the left panel
strings.scheduler.rightClickToAddModifyDrag: Right-click in the left panel to add/modify configuration groups, drag to sort. Configuration groups can contain Javascript scripts, key-mouse scripts, etc., with control over execution count and order,
strings.scheduler.rightClickOrButtonToAdd: Right-click in the left panel to add configuration groups, or click the button below to add directly
strings.scheduler.rightClickToAddDragToReorder: Right-click in the list below to add configurations, drag to reorder execution. Supports Javascript scripts, key-mouse recording scripts, etc. from BetterGI, with configurable execution count and order through scheduler.
strings.keyMouseRecord.title: Key-Mouse Recording & Playback
strings.keyMouseRecord.description: Record keyboard and mouse operations and play them back
strings.keyMouseRecord.name: Name
strings.captureTest.title: Capture Test Window
strings.notification.message.dragonEnd: One Dragon and config group tasks completed
strings.notification.message.taskCancelNormal: Task manually cancelled or normally ended
strings.notification.message.dailyRewardUnclaime: Daily reward unclaimed, please check manually!
strings.notification.error.unexpectedError: Scheduler task encountered an unexpected error, automatically restarting BGI
strings.notification.error.screenshotFailed: Failed to capture test notification screenshot
strings.notification.error.feishuWebhookFailed: Feishu webhook call failed with code: {0}
strings.notification.error.feishuTokenFailed: Feishu access token call failed with code: {0}
strings.notification.error.feishuUploadFailed: Feishu upload image failed with code: {0}
strings.notification.error.workWeixinImageFailed: WorkWeixin image webhook call failed with code: {0}
strings.notification.error.workWeixinTextFailed: WorkWeixin text webhook call failed with code: {0}
strings.notification.error.workWeixinEndpointEmp: WorkWeixin webhook endpoint is not set
strings.notification.error.feishuEndpointEmpty: Feishu webhook endpoint is not set
strings.notification.error.feishuImageKeyNotFoun: Feishu upload image not found image key
strings.notification.error.telegramTokenEmpty: Telegram bot token is not set
strings.notification.error.telegramChatIdEmpty: Telegram chat ID is not set
strings.notification.error.telegramTimeout: Telegram API request timed out. Check your internet connection.
strings.notification.error.telegramChatIdInvalid: Please send a message to the bot first and check that the chat ID is correct.
strings.notification.error.telegramApiNotFound: Telegram API not found (404). Please verify your bot token is correct. URL: {0}
strings.notification.error.oneBotIdRequired: OneBot requires either a user ID or group ID
